Input.name: customMods
Input.string: +150% to all elemental resistances // Stormy seas 100% of lightning damage converted to cold damage Your cold damage can shock // Changing seasons All damage taken from hits can chill you The effect of chill on you is reversed // Brine bound 50% chance to freeze enemies for 1 second when they hit you Enemies you freeze remain frozen for at least 1 second // Ghost of the deep 20% increased damage 30% increased cast speed 30% increased attack speed 30% increased movement speed
